rooms.description: A welcoming space with natural light and a reception area for the joint family. It acts as a transitional zone between outdoors and indoors.
An expansive, modern open-plan area combining kitchen and living spaces with seamless flow, adhering to Vastu principles of energy balance by orienting seating areas towards the east.
A spacious master bedroom designed for privacy; includes built-in wardrobes and a dedicated study nook. It is positioned in the north-east quadrant as per Vastu guidelines.
A secondary bedroom allocated for guests or family members, providing comfort with ample lighting from natural sources.
Integrated storage solutions and utility area including pantry and cleaning supplies closet near the kitchen.

openings.description: Large, inviting entrance leading to a well-lit foyer aligned with the plot's corner position.
Multiple strategically placed windows ensuring ample natural light and ventilation; positioned according to Vastu to enhance positive energy flow.
A staircase leading from ground floor living area to the rooftop terrace, promoting connectivity between indoor and outdoor spaces.

rooms.description: An expansive open space designed for leisure, dining, or meditation. Features include a pergola, seating areas, and integrated green spaces.

openings.description: Stairs connecting the living area to the rooftop terrace for easy access while maintaining architectural harmony.
